scriptedEmail.name: User Changed Password
scriptedEmail.description: Sends an email when a user has changed their password
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body">Your password on {site_name} has been changed.</resource> <resource name="Body_Disclaimer">If you didn't make this change, please contact the site administrator as soon as possible.</resource> <resource name="Subject">Password changed on {site_name}</resource> <resource name="Header">Password changed on {site_name}</resource> </language>
